title: Escape from sanity: a study of schizophrenia
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychiatric hospital care
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychiatry
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Schizophrenia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Schizophrenics - Rehabilitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness - Treatment
description: A detailed investigation of schizophrenia, the most common form of mental illness, interviewing patients and staff of a psychiatric hospital. Considers the causes of the condition and approaches to treatment and stresses the modern approach - the confrontation situation - based on research in schizophrenics' families.
